entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Algonquin Park (Brent)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 2.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Snow with ice pellets in the afternoon and with freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
